attributes.title: Racist
attributes.review: First off I got in the app and it asked me for my race I put Mexican because am a Mexican🇲🇽after I put that I was Mexican it Immediately took me of the app o thought it was a glitch and I wouldn’t be able to get it that app again🤬

attributes.title: no❤️
attributes.review: this app is T R A G I C ive never been more ✨d✨i✨s✨g✨u✨s✨t✨e✨d✨  id give this app -9393 stars if i could the fact that a sweaty deformed orange shrimp is on this app makes me so uncomfy✨ please dont get this app its GROSS this app should just get removed permanently from the app store (apple do your thing)👁👄👁

attributes.title: Horrible
attributes.review: Absolutely horrid app. I can not believe everything that I was seeing. The very stupid orange man who was featured (with not a very becoming face) was stupid and kept making redundant points. Very disappointing, wouldn’t recommend

attributes.title: Horrible app
attributes.review: Downloaded to help me learn more about politics and this candidate however the app was unusable and I had to delete it from my phone. I even tried reinstalling it with no luck. Do not download.

attributes.title: I lost my child (I’m stinky btw)
attributes.review: I have downloaded this app for are president (Cheeto😍)I have found out that they have took my children and now my fridge is gone to and now my fat self can’t eat❤️ that’s not okay and I demand my fridge back

attributes.title: I wish I could rate it 0
attributes.review: Seriously this is terrible I don’t even have the vocabulary to describe how bad it is. Also the person on the when you first open the app is disgusting. Nice try tho

attributes.title: Horrible
attributes.review: This app is the worst app I’ve ever seen it made me gag so many times that it sounded like I was beatboxing and I got hired to an     Acappella rap group where I later quit and decided to work at McDonald’s all because of this traumatizing app please delete it. Barf barf barf

attributes.title: Disappointed
attributes.review: This is the most disappointing app I have ever came across. #1 in news? It should be #1 in the trash- I’m truly just disgusted. I’m ashamed I even decided to download it. Deleted immediately. Do not waste your time!! 😡🔪

attributes.title: Gave me depression *whines*
attributes.review: *Rawr* This app hacked my phone and downloaded a bunch of nude furry pictures. *growls* I’m not giving it one star for the pictures but because it didn’t give the sources. Yiff Yiff.  Now my pickle has to take a beating and my heart will be yearning for more. Yiff yiff *licks paws*

attributes.title: This tiny app is pathetic
attributes.review:
I had hopes it would be a good app to keep up
In current events but it drains battery, freezes the screen and you have to restart the whole phone!
